name: animation-number-counter
description: Animated number counting with easing â€” counts from start to end value with configurable duration, formatting, and viewport trigger
postMessage:
Import and use:

import { NumberCounter, formatWithCommas, formatCurrency } from './components/animation-number-counter/NumberCounter';

<NumberCounter to={1500} duration={2} />
<NumberCounter to={99.9} decimals={1} prefix="$" />
<NumberCounter to={1000000} format={formatWithCommas} suffix=" users" />
<NumberCounter from={100} to={0} duration={3} />

The counter animates when it scrolls into view. Set triggerOnView={false} to animate on mount.
